biotools.summary: DAMEfinder (Differential Allele-specific MEthylation finder) is an R-package that detects allele-specific methylation (ASM) in a cohort of samples, and detects regions of differential ASM within groups of interest, based on Bisulfite-sequencing files.

bioschemas.name: DAMEfinder
bioschemas.summary: DAMEfinder (Differential Allele-specific MEthylation finder) is an R-package that detects allele-specific methylation (ASM) in a cohort of samples, and detects regions of differential ASM within groups of interest, based on Bisulfite-sequencing files.
